text.text:
*Day Pass* - `$30` 

Access during office hours 
(8:30am - 5pm, Monday through Friday)

 *5-day Flex Pack* - `$135` 

(8:30am - 5pm, Monday through Friday) 
Valid for 6-months

 *10-day Flex Pack* - `$230` 

 (8:30am - 5pm, Monday through Friday)
 Valid for 6-months

*Community Membership* 

 Individual - `$20` per month or `$180` per year 

 *Hot Desk Coworking* - `$225` per month 

Access during office hours 
(8:30am - 5pm, Monday through Friday) 
 4 hours per week of free access to meeting space

 *24/7 Coworking* - `$325` per month 

4 hours per month of free access to meeting space

 *Dedictated Desk* - `$435` per month 

24/7 access, 6 hours per month of free access to 
meeting space membership

 *Private Office* - `$895` per month

24/7 access, includes 10 hours per month of free access to meeting space Membership
